attributes.action: Fix the Special Educational needs provision in the UK. It's not fit for purpose.
attributes.additional_details: Review of the Ofsted and CQC inspections and tribunal challenges evidences what's going on but there is a lack of proper scoping exercises to appreciate the full extent of the issue. This needs to be urgently addressed.
attributes.background: Children and young Adults with physical and learning disabilities are being let down by the ongoing cuts to funding and the catastrophic mess that EHCPs are currently in. Many are effectively being excluded by failure of provision from having an education and this has to stop !

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned by special education needs provision in schools but we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You might like to this petition which asks for a review of the system:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228785

or this one which asks for more funding

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228955

Alternatively, you could start a new petition setting out clearly the changes you would like to see.
